block.p: AMERICAN LEAGUE OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Activated DH John Jaha from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned 3B Adam Piatt to Sacramento of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS--Placed Ruben Mateo on 15-day disabled. Purchased Scott Podsednik from Tulsa of the Texas League. Transferred Justin Thompson from 15 to 60-day disabled list.

AMERICAN LEAGUE OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Activated DH John Jaha from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned 3B Adam Piatt to Sacramento of the PCL. TEXAS RANGERS--Placed Ruben Mateo on 15-day disabled. Purchased Scott Podsednik from Tulsa of the Texas League. Transferred Justin Thompson from 15 to 60-day disabled list.

NATIONAL LEAGUE LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Placed OF Geronimo Berrora on the 15-day disabled list. Designated LHP Trever Miller for assignment. Recalled LHP Onan Masaoka from Albuquerque of the PCL. Purchased the contract of INF Shawn Gilbert from Albuquerque. MONTREAL EXPOS--Activated RHP Anthony Telford from the 15-day disabled list. Recalled LHP T.J. Tucker from Harrisburg of the Eastern League.
NATIONAL FOOTBALL LEAGUE CLEVELAND BROWNS--Signed WR JaJuan Dawson and CB Lewis Sanders to three-year contracts.
NATIONAL HOCKEY LEAGUE MONTREAL CANADIENS--Agreed to terms with D Francois Beauchemin and F Michael Ryder on three-year contracts.
SOCCER MAJOR LEAGUE SOCCER MLS--Suspended Miami MF Henry Gutierrez for a game and fined him $500 and suspended Miami MF Martin Machon for two games and fined him $1,500 for confronting officials.
